title: My Zombie Sweetheart
description: Once upon a time at a drive-in…TERROR! From outer space comes crashing to Earth, giving rise to creatures of pure-HORROR! The likes of which the quiet little town has never seen and the-NIGHTMARE! That befalls two old friends as they struggle to survive against impossible odds!It's Friday night, date night, in the quiet little town of Woodvale. For Suzie Palmer, this means hanging out at the All-Night Diner and maybe cruising up to Make-Out Point with her sweetheart. Little does she know there's something on it's way to Woodvale. Something cruel and insidious. Something… out of this world…MY ZOMBIE SWEETHEART is a love letter to 1950s sci-fi movies like The Blob and Invasion of the Body-Snatchers. It's a tale of young love, drag racing, alien invaders and heartbreak.
author: Christopher  Robertson
